Posts.Content: netty16 wrote: I went to a breast surgeon for lumpy sore breast. My Dr. felt a lump but could not see it on the ultrasound, so she did a needle biopsy. My biopsy came back negative. Now I  have to go every 3 months for follow up appointments. I just went back today for a follow up  and my Dr. felt the same spot she did biopsy and wants to cut it out. I just wanted to see if anyone else expeirenced anything like me and has some feedback. Log in to post a reply
